mapper.select: SELECT BAN_NO, BAN_NAME, BAN_COMENT, BAN_URL, BAN_IMAGE, CASE WHEN BAN_STATUS = 'Y' THEN '활성' ELSE '비활성' END AS BAN_STATUS FROM BANNER
SELECT BAN_NO, BAN_NAME, BAN_COMENT, BAN_URL, BAN_IMAGE, BAN_STATUS FROM BANNER WHERE BAN_NO = #{banNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE BANNER SET BAN_NAME = #{banName}, BAN_COMENT = #{banComent}, BAN_URL = #{banUrl}, BAN_IMAGE = #{banImage}, BAN_STATUS = #{banStatus} WHERE BAN_NO = #{banNo}
